title: Case Study on Language Education Utilizing Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone utilization skills and foundational understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity to analyze and apply language education case studies using mobile learning technologies for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more microlearning strategies effective for language acquisition in mobile learning environments.
Learners can explain the impact of mobile learning on language education settings through interview-based case analysis.
Learners can collaboratively develop a prototype of a mobile learning solution applicable to real educational institutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
